summary: As former cop Garza seeks revenge on Santos, the crime lord who framed him, he forms an unlikely team with a young hacker who successfully stole $10 million from Santos.
cast: Omar Chaparro|Joey Morgan|Eric Roberts|Kevin Pollak|Erick Elias|Aislinn Derbez|Héctor Jiménez|Mauricio Barrientos|Camila Sodi|José Sefami|Adrian Uribe|Espinoza Paz|Irán Castillo|Leonardo Ortizgris|Michael Arturo|Omar Ayala|Joaquín Cosio|Alejandro Cuétara|Francisco de la Reguera|Andrés Delgado|Natasha Esca|Angel Frost|Alejandra Guilmant|Evan Henderson|Armando Hernández|Héctor Holten|Daniel Rajunov|Daniel Rascón|Christopher Santos|Tasha Sulkowska
title: Compadres
